attributes.action: Tiered supertax for all UK super rich
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned demand the immediate imposition of tiered tarifffs of supertax ranging from 90% to 100% for individuals physically resident in the  UK  whose annual gross total remuneration exceeds £1 million per annum.

Details of  tariffs and superax thresholds - :

Remuneration & Threshold  £1 Million Tier 90%
Remuneration & Threshold  £2 Million Tier 91%
Remuneration & Threshold  £3 Million Tier 92%
Remuneration & Threshold  £4 Million Tier 93%
Remuneration & Threshold  £5 Million Tier 94%
Remuneration & Threshold  £6 Million Tier 95%
Remuneration & Threshold  £7 Million Tier 96%
Remuneration & Threshold  £8 Million Tier 97%
Remuneration & Threshold  £9 Million Tier 98%
Remuneration & Threshold  £10 Million Tier 99%

Remuneration & Threshold  £11 Million & Above
Tier 100%
